metadata.title: CVE-2024-57912 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: pressure: zpa2326: fix information leak in triggered bufferThe 'sample' local struct is used to push data to user space from atriggered buffer, but it has a hole between the temperature and thetimestamp (u32 pressure, u16 temperature, GAP, u64 timestamp).This hole is never initialized.Initialize the struct to zero before using it to avoid pushinguninitialized information to userspace.
